name: Cactus Farmer! (aplovestudio)
description:
Cactus Farmer is a game about farming cacti! You play as Pablo, a lonely farmer with a passion for prickly plants! As your cacti grow, you can harvest them to buy even more cacti! But watch out, farming for cacti may be a little more dangerous than it seems...

This game was made in about 2-3 hours. I poured my heart and soul into this game, as you can tell.
